title: Kelp Splatterscope
content:
The Kelp Splatterscope is a main weapon in Splatoon. It is a Splatterscope with a different loadout, and some kelp attached to the rear.

The Kelp Splatterscope is nearly identical in appearance to the Kelp Splat Charger. The only difference between the two is that the Kelp Splatterscope has a scope attached to the back end of the barrel.

The Kelp Splatterscope comes in a set with Sprinklers and the Killer Wail.

- The Kelp Splatterscope is a middleweight weapon.

- Ink consumption scales from 2.4% to 18% depending on the charge level.
The full-charge ink consumption of 18% allows players to fire 5 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.
This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- The full-charge ink consumption of 18% allows players to fire 5 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.

- This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- The scoped view begins to appear at 50% charge and becomes fully zoomed in at 100% charge.

- The scope limits the y-axis field of view to 28 degrees.

- The Kelp Splatterscope cannot store its charge.

- It takes 1 second to fully charge the weapon.
When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 3 seconds.

- When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 3 seconds.

- Shots cannot pierce through enemies.

- When charging while moving, the player's movement speed is set to 0.2 units per frame.

- Damage scales from 40 to 100 depending on the charge level. At full charge, the damage is 160.

- Shot velocity scales from 12 to 35.29 units per frame depending on the charge level. At full charge, the velocity is 48 units per frame.

- Shot distance scales from 90 to 200 depending on the charge level. At full charge, the distance is 286.

- The full-charge ink consumption of 18% allows players to fire 5 shots before needing to refill the ink supply.

- This stat can be changed with Ink Saver (Main).

- When charging a shot with an empty tank, the charge rate is 33.33%, permitting the player to fully charge a shot in 3 seconds.

- ▲ Range when fully charged increased by about 4%.

The Kelp Splatterscope is a Kelp Splat Charger with an added scope for long-distance aiming. It's great for hitting far-off targets, but your view is narrow while charging, so careful where you use it!
